title: Elspeth
description: Kira and Elspeth have already broken First Law many times over. Now outlawed and running for their lives, they are determined to stand amongst the men and fight the unjust First Law that binds the kingdom. But cruel Lord Dorcon still stands in their way and the heat of his chase is stronger than ever, in the thrilling sequel to Shadow of the Dragon, Kira.
author: Kate O'Hearn
